title: Peditral Bubble Gum 500ML Oral Soln 1x1 (P)
details: This product is used to replace Fluids and Minerals (such as sodium, potassium) lost due to Diarrhea and Vomiting.
precautions: Consult your doctor/Pharmacist before using this product, inability to keep fluids in the stomach due to severe/persistent Vomiting, Difficulty urinating, Intestinal blockage.

title: Peditral Banana 500ML Oral Soln
details: It is used to prevent and treat dehydration, especially that due to diarrhea.
precautions: Use With Caution having a blockage in the intestines or perforation (tear or hole) in the bowel.

title: Paedi Care Ice Cream Soda 500ML Liquid
details: This Product Is Used To Replace Fluids And Minerals (Such As Sodium, Potassium) Lost Due To Diarrhea And Vomiting. It Helps Prevent Or Treat The Loss Of Too Much Body Water (Dehydration). Having The Right Amount Of Fluids And Minerals Is Important F READ MORE
precautions: Before Taking This Product, Tell Your Doctor Or Pharmacist If You Are Allergic To It; Or If You Have Any Other Allergies. This Product May Contain Inactive Ingredients, Which Can Cause Allergic Reactions Or Other Problems. Talk To Your Pharmacist For More Details.
effects: Mild Nausea And Vomiting May Occur. These Effects Can Be Decreased By Taking This Product Slowly In Small Amounts With A Spoon. If Any Of These Effects Persist Or Worsen, Contact Your Doctor Or Pharmacist Promptly.
